error-severity.title: Severity: Error
error-severity.description: Hints for this rule will be shown as error

warning-severity.title: Severity: Warning
warning-severity.description: Hints for this rule will be shown as warning

off-severity.title: Severity: Off
off-severity.description: Hints for this rule will not be shown

alt-require.title: Rule: alt-require
alt-require.description: The 'alt' attribute of an '<img>' element must be present and 'alt' attribute of 'area[href]' and 'input[type=image]' must have a value.

attr-lowercase.title: Rule: attr-lowercase
attr-lowercase.description: All attribute names must be in lowercase.

attr-no-unnecessary-whitespace.title: Rule: attr-no-unnecessary-whitespace
attr-no-unnecessary-whitespace.description: No spaces between attribute names and values.

attr-sorted.title: Rule: attr-sorted
attr-sorted.description: Attribute tags must be in proper order.

attr-unsafe-chars.title: Rule: attr-unsafe-chars
attr-unsafe-chars.description: Attribute values cannot contain unsafe chars.

attr-value-double-quotes.title: Rule: attr-value-double-quotes
attr-value-double-quotes.description: Attribute values must be in double quotes.

attr-value-single-quotes.title: Rule: attr-value-single-quotes
attr-value-single-quotes.description: Attribute values must be in single quotes.

attr-whitespace.title: Rule: attr-whitespace
attr-whitespace.description: All attributes should be separated by only one space and not have leading/trailing whitespace.

head-script-disabled.title: Rule: head-script-disabled
head-script-disabled.description: The <script> tag cannot be used in a <head> tag.

href-abs-or-rel.title: Rule: href-abs-or-rel
href-abs-or-rel.description: An href attribute must be either absolute or relative.

id-class-ad-disabled.title: Rule: id-class-ad-disabled
id-class-ad-disabled.description: The id and class attributes cannot use the ad keyword, it will be blocked by adblock software.

id-class-value.title: Rule: id-class-value
id-class-value.description: The id and class attribute values must meet the specified rules.

id-unique.title: Rule: id-unique
id-unique.description: The value of id attributes must be unique.

input-requires-label.title: Rule: input-requires-label
input-requires-label.description: All [ input ] tags must have a corresponding [ label ] tag.

script-disabled.title: Rule: script-disabled
script-disabled.description: The <script> tag cannot be used in a <head> tag.

space-tab-mixed-disabled.title: Rule: space-tab-mixed-disabled
space-tab-mixed-disabled.description: Do not mix tabs and spaces for indentation.

src-not-empty.title: Rule: src-not-empty
src-not-empty.description: The src attribute of an img, script or link must have a value.

tag-self-close.title: Rule: tag-self-close
tag-self-close.description: Empty tags must be self closed.

tagname-lowercase.title: Rule: tagname-lowercase
tagname-lowercase.description: All html element names must be in lowercase.

tagname-specialchars.title: Rule: tagname-specialchars
tagname-specialchars.description: All html element names must be in lowercase.
